PerfectNetExp.abs: 【摘要】：正以17世纪家具名匠布勒(Boulle)命名的法国著名的布勒高级装饰艺术学院是以家具设计教育闻名全欧的一所学院,这所学 …
boulle 布尔, boulle 镶嵌装饰, boulle 镶嵌的家具
boullard 布拉尔, boulle 镶嵌的家具, boulle 布尔

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from 法 boule, from the name of André Charles Boulle (1642–1732), French cabinetmaker. The variant buhl apparently a modern Germanized spelling

means.word_mean: 1. an inlaid furniture decoration; tortoiseshell and yellow and white metal form scrolls in cabinetwork
